testsuite.name: Search for solid blue shirt and check XL availability on Wrangler.in

testcase.name: Search for solid blue shirt, verify XL availability, and add to cart
testcase.classname: Search for solid blue shirt and check XL availability on Wrangler.in

failure.message: EXPECTED RESULT: Visual signals MEN, WOMEN, NEW ARRIVALS, DENIM all present. ACTUAL RESULT: MEN present, WOMEN present, NEW ARRIVALS missing (found NEW IN), DENIM missing.

property.name: Proofs Base Folder, includes screenshots, recording, netwrok logs, api logs, sec logs, accessibility logs
plan
property.value: 1. Navigate to https://www.wrangler.in/ and verify homepage visual signals. 2. Wait for the homepage to fully load and confirm visual signals: MEN, WOMEN, NEW ARRIVALS, DENIM. 3. Close any promotional popup or banner if present and verify the close control is available. 4. Click the search icon or focus the search input and verify the search UI appears. 5. Type "solid blue shirt" into the search field and submit the query, then verify the results page shows product listings. 6. Ensure the search results contain at least one product titled "Solid Blue Shirt" and that price and Add to Cart options are displayed. 7. Click on the first matching Solid Blue Shirt product and verify the product detail page loads with size options. 8. Verify that size options include "XL" and that the XL size is available. 9. Select size "XL" and confirm the selection is reflected. 10. Click the "Add to Cart" button and verify a success indication (e.g., "Added", "Success", "Cart"). 11. Navigate to the cart page and verify the cart displays the Solid Blue Shirt with size "XL" and quantity 1.

property.name: next_step
property.value: No further action required as the required visual signals are not fully present.

testcase.system-out: Final Response: Test failed: Expected visual signals "NEW ARRIVALS" and "DENIM" were not found on the homepage. Detected signals: MEN (present), WOMEN (present), NEW IN (found instead of NEW ARRIVALS).
